parameters.name: tenant-id
parameters.description: The ID of the tenant owning the requested Twin.

schema.description:
Battery performance and durability data model

Copyright ? 2024 Circulor (for and on behalf of the Battery Pass Consortium). This work is li-censed under a Creative Commons License Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0). Readers may reproduce material for their own publications, as long as it is not sold com-mercially and is given appropriate attribution.

allOf.description: Covers all Capability related data attributes

powerCapabilityRatio.description: Ratio between nominal allowed battery power (W) and battery energy (Wh).

items.description: The internal resistance is ´┐¢a quotient of change of voltage of a battery by the corresponding change in discharge current under specified conditions´┐¢ (IEV 482 03 36).

batteryCondition.description:
'- Expected battery lifetime expressed in cycles, and reference test used.
- Their expected life-time under the reference conditions for which they have been designed in terms of cycles, except for non-cycle applications, and calendar years.

allOf.description: Covers all battery lifetime relevant properties

lastUpdate.description: Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.

numberOfFullCycles.description: - Information and data as a result of its use, including the number of charging and discharging cycles.
